title: Worked Solution
text: The probability that the two faces of the coins are the same is $$\frac{1}{4}$$ or 25%. This is because there are $$4$$ possible outcomes when flipping two coins: HH, HT, TH, and TT. Only $$1$$ of these outcomes results in the two faces being the same (TT or HH), so the probability is $$\frac{1}{4}$$.
